name: Ast√©rix
description: Asterix is a 2D beat'em up game, based on the comic book series of Asterix. The player chooses one of the two characters - Asterix or Obelix (both characters in game have equal power). The gameplay is typical of the genre - the player goes to the right, beats the next enemy and at the end of fights against boss. (for example - the Roman Testudo). The player can count on help from Falbala and Idefix - the girl kisses the hero, and the dog brings the magic potion.The game has a mini-game - horse chariots.
